<root main_tree_to_execute="LocateAndNavigateToLadderSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocateAndNavigateToLadderSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocateAndNavigateToLadder">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="cooking pot" 
                        position_x="{cooking_pot_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{cooking_pot_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{cooking_pot_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleCookingPotFallback">
                <Sequence name="NavigateAfterLocatingPot">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{ladder_position_x}" y="{ladder_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="FailedToLocatePotHandling">
                    <Wait duration="2.0" />
                    <Navigate x="{ladder_position_x}" y="{ladder_position_y}" />
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

<root main_tree_to_execute="LocatePickAndPlacePlateSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocatePickAndPlacePlateSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocatePickAndPlacePlate">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="ceramic plate with some bread crumbs" 
                        position_x="{plate_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{plate_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{plate_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Pick object="ceramic plate with some bread crumbs" 
                      grip_strength="medium" 
                      precision="high" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="26.7" y="9.4" /> <!-- Position of the folding chair -->
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Place object="ceramic plate with some bread crumbs" 
                       surface="ground" 
                       orientation="upright" 
                       alignment="beside chair" />

                        position_x="{water_bottle_position_x}"

            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="{stack_of_wood_position_x}" y="{stack_of_wood_position_y}" />

bt_xml:
<root main_tree_to_execute="LocateAndRetrieveMapSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocateAndRetrieveMapSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocateAndRetrieveMap">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a map" 
                        position_x="{map_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{map_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{map_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleMapPickupFallback">
                <Sequence name="DirectMapPickup">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{map_position_x}" y="{map_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a map" 
                              grip_strength="low" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="MapPickupRecovery">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{map_position_x}" y="{map_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="3">
                        <Locate object="a map" 
                                position_x="{map_position_x}" 
                                position_y="{map_position_y}" 
                                position_z="{map_position_z}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a map" 
                              grip_strength="low" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="18.1" y="7.9" /> <!-- Coordinates for camping stove -->
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

                        position_z="{toolkit_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleToolkitPickupFallback">
                <Sequence name="DirectToolkitPickup">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{toolkit_position_x}" y="{toolkit_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a toolkit" 
                              grip_strength="high" 
                              precision="medium" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="RetryToolkitLocating">
                    <Retry num_attempts="3">
                        <Locate object="a toolkit" 
                                position_x="{toolkit_position_x}" 
                                position_y="{toolkit_position_y}" 
                                position_z="{toolkit_position_z}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{toolkit_position_x}" y="{toolkit_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a toolkit" 
                              grip_strength="high" 
                              precision="medium" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="{stack_of_wood_position_x}" y="{stack_of_wood_position_y}" />
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

explanation: Good, I will first locate the backpack and if found, I will pick it up using medium grip strength and high precision. After that, I will navigate to the folding chair so that I can sit down and organize my supplies for our hiking trip. If there are any failures during these steps, I will handle them gracefully using fallback mechanisms.
bt_xml:
<root main_tree_to_execute="LocateAndOrganizeSuppliesSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocateAndOrganizeSuppliesSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocateAndOrganizeSupplies">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a backpack" 
                        position_x="{backpack_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{backpack_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{backpack_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleBackpackPickupFallback">
                <Sequence name="BackpackPickup">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a backpack" 
                              grip_strength="medium" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="26.7" y="9.4" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="FallbackPickup">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="15.8" y="3.3" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="26.7" y="9.4" />
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

query: Please locate the first aid kit and bring it to me.
explanation: Good, I will locate the first aid kit using my sensors. Once I have its position, I will navigate to it and pick it up. After that, I will bring it back to you by navigating to your location.
bt_xml:
<root main_tree_to_execute="LocateAndRetrieveFirstAidKitSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocateAndRetrieveFirstAidKitSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocateAndRetrieveFirstAidKit">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a first aid kit" 
                        position_x="{first_aid_kit_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{first_aid_kit_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{first_aid_kit_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleFirstAidKitRetrievalFallback">
                <Sequence name="DirectRetrieval">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{first_aid_kit_position_x}" y="{first_aid_kit_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a first aid kit" 
                              grip_strength="medium" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="RecoveryPlan">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{backup_position_x}" y="{backup_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="3">
                        <Locate object="a first aid kit" 
                                position_x="{first_aid_kit_position_x}" 
                                position_y="{first_aid_kit_position_y}" 
                                position_z="{first_aid_kit_position_z}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{first_aid_kit_position_x}" y="{first_aid_kit_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a first aid kit" 
                              grip_strength="medium" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="{user_position_x}" y="{user_position_y}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Place object="a first aid kit" 
                       surface="floor" 
                       orientation="upright" 
                       alignment="center" />
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

<root main_tree_to_execute="LocatePickAndPlaceCrowbarSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocatePickAndPlaceCrowbarSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocatePickAndPlaceCrowbar">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="crowbar" 
                        position_x="{crowbar_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{crowbar_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{crowbar_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleCrowbarPickupFallback">
                <Sequence name="CrowbarPickup">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{crowbar_position_x}" y="{crowbar_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="crowbar" 
                              grip_strength="high" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="FallbackCrowbarPickup">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{crowbar_position_x}" y="{crowbar_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="crowbar" 
                              grip_strength="high" 
                              precision="medium" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="{car_jack_position_x}" y="{car_jack_position_y}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Place object="crowbar" 
                       surface="ground" 
                       orientation="upright" 
                       alignment="next to car jack" />
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

query: Could you please locate the fireproof blanket, pick it up with medium grip strength, and then navigate to the living room to place it flat on the floor?
explanation: Good, I will first locate the fireproof blanket, then I will pick it up using medium grip strength. After that, I will navigate to the living room and place the blanket flat on the floor. If any step fails, I will try to handle the error gracefully.
bt_xml:
<root main_tree_to_execute="LocatePickPlaceBlanketSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocatePickPlaceBlanketSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocatePickPlaceBlanket">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a fireproof blanket" 
                        position_x="{blanket_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{blanket_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{blanket_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleBlanketPickupFallback">
                <Sequence name="PickupBlanket">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{blanket_position_x}" y="{blanket_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a fireproof blanket" 
                              grip_strength="medium" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="RetryLocatingBlanket">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Locate object="a fireproof blanket" 
                                position_x="{blanket_position_x}" 
                                position_y="{blanket_position_y}" 
                                position_z="{blanket_position_z}" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="{living_room_position_x}" y="{living_room_position_y}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Place object="a fireproof blanket" 
                       surface="floor" 
                       orientation="flat" 
                       alignment="center" />
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

query: Could you please locate the ceramic plate with some bread crumbs, pick it up with medium grip strength, and then navigate to the sink to place the plate in the empty glass cup?
explanation: Good, I will first locate the ceramic plate with some bread crumbs. Once I have its position, I will navigate to it and pick it up using medium grip strength. After that, I'll navigate to the sink where the empty glass cup is located and place the ceramic plate inside the cup.
bt_xml:
<root main_tree_to_execute="LocateAndPlacePlateSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocateAndPlacePlateSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocateAndPlacePlate">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="ceramic plate with some bread crumbs" 
                        position_x="{plate_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{plate_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{plate_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandlePlatePickupFallback">
                <Sequence name="PickupPlate">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{plate_position_x}" y="{plate_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="ceramic plate with some bread crumbs" 
                              grip_strength="medium" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="HandlePickupFailure">
                    <Wait duration="2.0" />
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Locate object="ceramic plate with some bread crumbs" 
                                position_x="{plate_position_x}" 
                                position_y="{plate_position_y}" 
                                position_z="{plate_position_z}" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="3.2" y="1.8" /> <!-- Coordinates of the empty glass cup -->
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Place object="ceramic plate with some bread crumbs" 
                       surface="empty glass cup" 
                       orientation="upright" 
                       alignment="center" />
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

<root main_tree_to_execute="LocatePickAndUseExtinguisherSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocatePickAndUseExtinguisherSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocatePickAndUseExtinguisher">

                <Locate object="fire extinguisher" 
                        position_x="{fire_extinguisher_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{fire_extinguisher_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{fire_extinguisher_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Pick object="fire extinguisher" 
                      grip_strength="high" 
                      precision="medium" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="{camping_stove_position_x}" 
                          y="{camping_stove_position_y}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="FlamesCheckFallback">
                <Sequence name="CheckForFlames">
                    <!-- This assumes a hypothetical action for checking flames -->
                    <Locate object="flame" 
                            position_x="{flame_position_x}" 
                            position_y="{flame_position_y}" 
                            position_z="{flame_position_z}" />
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="UseExtinguisherIfFlamesPresent">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="fire extinguisher" 
                              grip_strength="high" 
                              precision="medium" />
                    </Retry>
                    <!-- Action to use the extinguisher would be here -->
                    <Wait duration="5.0"/> <!-- Hypothetical duration for extinguishing -->
                </Sequence>

query: Could you please locate the cooking pot, pick it up with medium grip strength, then navigate to the water bottle and pour some water into the pot before placing it back on the counter upright?
explanation: Good, I will locate the cooking pot first, then I will pick it up using medium grip strength. After that, I will navigate to the water bottle and pour some water into the pot. Finally, I will place the pot back on the counter in an upright position.
bt_xml:
<root main_tree_to_execute="LocatePickPourAndPlacePotSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocatePickPourAndPlacePotSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocatePickPourAndPlacePot">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a cooking pot" 
                        position_x="{cooking_pot_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{cooking_pot_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{cooking_pot_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="{cooking_pot_position_x}" y="{cooking_pot_position_y}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Pick object="a cooking pot" 
                      grip_strength="medium" 
                      precision="high" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a water bottle" 
                        position_x="{water_bottle_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{water_bottle_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{water_bottle_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="{water_bottle_position_x}" y="{water_bottle_position_y}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Wait duration="2.0" /> <!-- Simulate pouring water -->
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Navigate x="{cooking_pot_position_x}" y="{cooking_pot_position_y}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Place object="a cooking pot" 
                       surface="counter" 
                       orientation="upright" 
                       alignment="center" />
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

query: Could you please locate the silver knife, pick it up with medium grip strength, then navigate to the ceramic plate and place the knife next to it upright?
explanation: Good, I will first locate the silver knife and then pick it up using medium grip strength. After that, I will navigate to the ceramic plate's position, and finally, I will place the knife next to it in an upright orientation.
bt_xml:
<root main_tree_to_execute="LocatePickAndPlaceKnifeSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocatePickAndPlaceKnifeSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocatePickAndPlaceKnife">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a silver knife" 
                        position_x="{knife_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{knife_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{knife_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Pick object="a silver knife" 
                      grip_strength="medium" 
                      precision="high" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="2.7" y="2.0" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Place object="a silver knife" 
                       surface="ceramic plate" 
                       orientation="upright" 
                       alignment="next to" />
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

query: Could you please locate the backpack, pick it up with medium grip strength, then navigate to the first aid kit and place the backpack next to it upright?
explanation: Good, I will first locate the backpack. Once I have its position, I will navigate to it and pick it up using medium grip strength. After that, I will navigate to the first aid kit's position and place the backpack next to it in an upright orientation. This task is straightforward and can be executed using the available actions in my context.
bt_xml:
<root main_tree_to_execute="LocatePickNavigatePlaceSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocatePickNavigatePlaceSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocatePickNavigatePlace">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a backpack" 
                        position_x="{backpack_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{backpack_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{backpack_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleBackpackPickupFallback">
                <Sequence name="PickupBackpack">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{backpack_position_x}" y="{backpack_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a backpack" 
                              grip_strength="medium" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="RetryLocateBackpack">
                    <Retry num_attempts="3">
                        <Locate object="a backpack" 
                                position_x="{backpack_position_x}" 
                                position_y="{backpack_position_y}" 
                                position_z="{backpack_position_z}" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a first aid kit" 
                        position_x="{first_aid_kit_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{first_aid_kit_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{first_aid_kit_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandlePlaceFallback">
                <Sequence name="NavigateToFirstAidKit">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{first_aid_kit_position_x}" y="{first_aid_kit_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Place object="a backpack" 
                               surface="ground" 
                               orientation="upright" 
                               alignment="next to first aid kit" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="RetryLocateFirstAidKit">
                    <Retry num_attempts="3">
                        <Locate object="a first aid kit" 
                                position_x="{first_aid_kit_position_x}" 
                                position_y="{first_aid_kit_position_y}"

query: Could you please locate the medical splint, pick it up with medium grip strength, navigate to the water bottle, and place the splint next to the water bottle aligned to the center?
explanation: I will first attempt to locate the medical splint by using the `Locate` action. Once I have the coordinates of the medical splint, I will navigate to its position and pick it up using a medium grip strength. After that, I will navigate to the water bottle's position and finally place the medical splint next to the water bottle, ensuring it is aligned to the center. If any of these steps fail, I will gracefully handle the error and attempt to recover from it using fallback mechanisms.
bt_xml:
<root main_tree_to_execute="LocateAndRetrieveSplintSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocateAndRetrieveSplintSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocateAndRetrieveSplint">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="medical splint" 
                        position_x="{splint_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{splint_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{splint_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleSplintRetrievalFallback">
                <Sequence name="RetrieveSplint">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{splint_position_x}" y="{splint_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="medical splint" 
                              grip_strength="medium" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="FailedToRetrieveSplint">
                    <Wait duration="2.0" />
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Locate object="medical splint" 
                                position_x="{splint_position_x}" 
                                position_y="{splint_position_y}" 
                                position_z="{splint_position_z}" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Navigate x="{water_bottle_position_x}" y="{water_bottle_position_y}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Place object="medical splint" 
                       surface="next to the water bottle" 
                       orientation="upright" 
                       alignment="center" />
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

After that, I will navigate to the sleeping bag's position and place the first aid kit next to it, ensuring that it's aligned to the center.

<root main_tree_to_execute="LocateAndRetrieveFirstAidKit">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocateAndRetrieveFirstAidKit">
        <Sequence name="RetrieveAndPlaceFirstAidKit">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a first aid kit" 
                        position_x="{first_aid_kit_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{first_aid_kit_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{first_aid_kit_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleFirstAidKitRetrievalFallback">
                <Sequence name="DirectFirstAidKitRetrieval">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{first_aid_kit_position_x}" y="{first_aid_kit_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a first aid kit" 
                              grip_strength="medium" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="RecoveryIfFailed">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{first_aid_kit_position_x}" y="{first_aid_kit_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a first aid kit" 
                              grip_strength="medium" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="{sleeping_bag_position_x}" y="{sleeping_bag_position_y}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Place object="a first aid kit" 
                       surface="ground" 
                       orientation="upright" 
                       alignment="center" />
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

query: Could you please locate the smartphone, pick it up with low grip strength, navigate to the camping stove, and then place the smartphone on the stove aligned to the center?
explanation: I will start by locating the smartphone in the environment. Once I find it, I will pick it up using low grip strength. After successfully picking it up, I will navigate to the camping stove's position. Finally, I will place the smartphone on the camping stove, ensuring it is aligned to the center. I will use fallback nodes to gracefully handle any failures in locating or picking up the smartphone, as well as navigating to the camping stove.
bt_xml:
<root main_tree_to_execute="LocateAndPlaceSmartphoneSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocateAndPlaceSmartphoneSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocateAndPlaceSmartphone">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a smartphone" 
                        position_x="{smartphone_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{smartphone_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{smartphone_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleSmartphonePickupFallback">
                <Sequence name="PickupSmartphone">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a smartphone" 
                              grip_strength="low" 
                              precision="medium" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="RecoveryAttempt">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">

                       alignment="center" />

query: Could you please locate the car jack, pick it up with high grip strength, navigate to the car parked in the driveway, and then place the car jack underneath the car aligned to the center?
explanation: Good, I will start by locating the car jack. Once I have its position, I will proceed to pick it up using high grip strength. After successfully picking it up, I will navigate to the car parked in the driveway. Finally, I will place the car jack underneath the car, making sure it is aligned to the center.
bt_xml:
<root main_tree_to_execute="LocateAndUseCarJackSequence">
    <BehaviorTree ID="LocateAndUseCarJackSequence">
        <Sequence name="LocateAndUseCarJack">
            <Retry num_attempts="3">
                <Locate object="a car jack" 
                        position_x="{car_jack_position_x}" 
                        position_y="{car_jack_position_y}" 
                        position_z="{car_jack_position_z}" />
            </Retry>
            <Fallback name="HandleCarJackPickupFallback">
                <Sequence name="CarJackPickup">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Navigate x="{car_jack_position_x}" y="{car_jack_position_y}" />
                    </Retry>
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Pick object="a car jack" 
                              grip_strength="high" 
                              precision="high" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence name="HandlePickupFailure">
                    <Retry num_attempts="2">
                        <Wait duration="2.0" />
                    </Retry>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Navigate x="{car_position_x}" y="{car_position_y}" />
            </Retry>
            <Retry num_attempts="2">
                <Place object="a car jack" 
                       surface="underneath the car" 
                       orientation="upright" 
                       alignment="center" />
            </Retry>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>
